sentence.Network_en: Such stoppages as are observed in practice are thus attributed to mistakes or even irrationality.
sentence.Network_cn: 在实际情况中看到的这些停工,要归因于失误或甚至是非理性的东西.

sentence.Network_en: For all its harshness and irrationality, it is the only world we've got.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管它严酷而又不合理, 它终究是我们具有的唯一的世界.

sentence.Network_en: One is, from the inner mechanism, to point out its irrationality.
sentence.Network_cn: 一方面, 从反倾销法的内部机制入手, 指出它的不合理之处.

entry.tran: 不合逻辑的;不合理的;荒谬的
entry.def: If you describe someone's feelings and behaviour as irrational, you mean they are not based on logical reasons or clear thinking.

means.word_mean: 1. the state of being irrational; lacking powers of understanding
